TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit STGMEDIUM extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary:
This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Provides a generalized global memory handle to use for data transfer operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about programming with the STGMEDIUM structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the "MMC Programmer's Guide" in the [MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).

Docs.threadsafe: Any public static (Shared in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe. Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.
